description: Try our easy to follow Chicken and Freekeh Quesadillas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Quesadilla,Seafood free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken,Sesame free
name: Chicken and Freekeh Quesadillas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch coriander (save a few sprigs to garnish)
425g corn cobettes, microwaved as per package instructions, cut kernels from cob
425g Macro Organic red kidney beans, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add garlic and onion and saut√© for 2 minutes. Add cumin and ground coriander and stir for 1 minute. Add tomato paste, kidney beans, corn and capsicum and cook, stirring, until thickened. Stir in chicken, freekeh and coriander.

Heat a clean non-stick pan over medium heat. Add 1 tortilla to the pan, fill half with chicken mixture and a quarter of the cheese. Fold closed and toast on each side for 1-2 minutes or until golden and cheese has melted. Repeat with remaining mixture and tortillas. Slice each folded quesadilla in half and serve immediately.
